Saiyyad Rashid Ali vs Madhya Pradesh State Wakf Board on 18 April, 2023
Saiyyad Rashid Ali vs Madhya Pradesh State Wakf Board on 18
April, 2023
Author: Subodh Abhyankar
Bench: Subodh Abhyankar
IN THE HIGH COURT OF MADHYA PRADESH AT INDORE FA NO.85/2020, 86/2020, MA

735/2023, MP 1040/2023, 1580/2023, 1330/2020, CR 279/2023, MCC 738/2023, FA 863/2023,
MA 2237/2023, MP 3764/2022, 3787/2022, CONC 2326/2021, 2352/2021, 2503/2021 AND MCC
797/2022 Indore, Dated: 18.04.2023.
Due to paucity of time, the above mentioned cases could not be taken up and this common order is
being passed.
Let the same be listed after two weeks.
Signed copy of this order be placed in all above mentioned cases.
Interim relief, if any, to continue till the next date of hearing.
(SUBODH ABHYANKAR) JUDGE DAS
